title: Cost of an angioplasty in various countries 2019
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Cost in U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Cost in U.S. dollars and Thailand has the lowest Cost in U.S. dollars.
The highest Country United States has 24000.0 more Cost in U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Thailand.
